3505.verse: [This is] the revelation of the Book about which there is no doubt from the Lord of the worlds.

3506.verse: Or do they say, "He invented it"? Rather, it is the truth from your Lord, [O Muhammad], that you may warn a people to whom no warner has come before you [so] perhaps they will be guided.

3507.verse: It is Allah who created the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them in six days; then He established Himself above the Throne. You have not besides Him any protector or any intercessor; so will you not be reminded?

3508.verse: He arranges [each] matter from the heaven to the earth; then it will ascend to Him in a Day, the extent of which is a thousand years of those which you count.

3509.verse: That is the Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, the Exalted in Might, the Merciful,

3510.verse: Who perfected everything which He created and began the creation of man from clay.

3511.verse: Then He made his posterity out of the extract of a liquid disdained.

3512.verse: Then He proportioned him and breathed into him from His [created] soul and made for you hearing and vision and hearts; little are you grateful.

3513.verse: And they say, "When we are lost within the earth, will we indeed be [recreated] in a new creation?" Rather, they are, in [the matter of] the meeting with their Lord, disbelievers.

3514.verse: Say, "The angel of death will take you who has been entrusted with you. Then to your Lord you will be returned."
